name: Stat Changes
flavor: Feeling weak... or... strong? I don't know how to feel.
text:
- Stat changes done by different moves stack up to a maximum of +/- 3.
- Critical hits on stat change moves apply/reduce one additional stat point, but not past the limit! If it would boost multiple stats, you get to choose one which will receive the crit bonus.
- Defense cannot go below 0, combat stats can't go below 1.
- A Pok√©mon can only be influenced by a buff/debuff once per source. This includes the move AND the source.
- Buffs/debuffs to hit rate add +1/-1 to the hit rolls total value. You do not roll additional hit dice.
